wikipedia_page.main: Ian Davidson (born 31 January 1947 in Goole) is an English former footballer who played as a central defender or a defensive midfielder in the Football League for Hull City, Scunthorpe United, York City, AFC Bournemouth and Stockport County.

response: *Ian Davidson (British politician) (born 1950), former Scottish Labour Co-operative MP
*Ian Davidson (South African politician) (born 1951), South African Democratic Alliance MP
*Ian Damon (Ian Davidson, born 1935), Australian broadcaster and disc jockey
